title: Joe Walser (Time machine maker)
description: This week we're joined by Joe Walser the man behind the restoration of the Time Machine (DeLorean) from Back to the Future. Matt fully indulges in the most obscure details of Joe's adventure in restoring the movie car.  Joe also gives us a crash course on the multitude of supply houses used for prop creation that helped out with the restoration effort.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
